g.text: asks to see an overview of all the tests performed and analyse the overall performance of the company
shows an overview of all the tests performed, asks the interval of time to be analysed and asks the algorithm to use
[while Laboratory Coordinator changes the data to make the analysis]
types requested data (e.g firstDayToAnalyse, lastDayToAnalyse, chosenAlgorithm)
shows the overall performance of the company for the chosen interval of time
